templates.name: Landing Page
templates.description: Une page unique optimisée pour la conversion et la présentation de produit.
templates.aiPromptContext: Create a high-converting landing page with a clear hero section, features grid, testimonials, and a call-to-action footer. Focus on conversion and clear messaging.

templates.name: Portfolio
templates.description: Idéal pour les créatifs, photographes et freelances souhaitant exposer leurs travaux.
templates.aiPromptContext: Create a personal portfolio website focusing on visual hierarchy, large project thumbnails, an about me section, and a contact form. Use a masonry or grid layout for the work section.

templates.name: SaaS / App
templates.description: Interface moderne pour application web ou logiciel en tant que service.
templates.aiPromptContext: Create a modern SaaS marketing site with a dashboard preview, pricing tables, feature breakdown, and authentication flow placeholders. Use a clean, tech-focused aesthetic.

templates.name: E-commerce
templates.description: Boutique en ligne complète pour vendre des produits physiques ou numériques.
templates.aiPromptContext: Create an e-commerce storefront with a product grid, product detail modal, shopping cart sidebar, and a clean checkout flow UI. Focus on product imagery and buy buttons.

templates.name: Blog
templates.description: Site éditorial pour publier des articles, actualités et tutoriels.
templates.aiPromptContext: Create a content-focused blog layout with good typography, article list view, categories sidebar, and an author bio section. Optimize for readability.

styles.name: Minimaliste
styles.description: Épuré, beaucoup d'espace blanc, typographie simple.
styles.promptKeyword: minimalist, clean, whitespace, swiss design, simple typography, monochrome or single accent color

styles.name: Dark Mode
styles.description: Moderne, élégant, contrastes forts sur fond sombre.
styles.promptKeyword: dark mode, futuristic, neon accents, slate background, high contrast, tech aesthetic

styles.name: Corporate
styles.promptKeyword: professional, corporate, blue tones, trustworthy, business, clean lines, structured layout

styles.name: Créatif
styles.description: Couleurs vives, formes organiques, typographie audacieuse.
styles.promptKeyword: playful, colorful, organic shapes, bold typography, vibrant, rounded corners, friendly
